name: HexMap Revisited
description:
Hello all! I'm Mike, also known as mikxingu, and I'm here to present you HexMap Revisited.

I rebuilt the entire project from scratch, using Unity 2020, and I'm currently working on making this a playable RPG Game Creator.

I'm sharing the current state of the project to get some visibility and feedback.

My main goal is to turn this into a RPG Campaign Creator, kinda like "Roll20", but 3D.

There will be a Game Master, who controls the entire map, events and such, and the players. 

The players will have to gather resources, eat, fight monsters and other players to win the match. But this could be way more expandable.

Anyways, hope you have fun playing it and please leave a comment on how I can improve this game.

Thank you!
